entry: TODO:"Nothing COMPARES to it... Just what made it so delectable?"
TODO:On Ranged Attack Hit: {colour_start|move}Shuffle{colour_end} Target {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(100%% base){colour_end}
TODO:On Being Hit: {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} 2 pts/tn for 2 tns {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(+1 pt per Difficulty){colour_end}
TODO:-25%% {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} Received if has less than 2 {colour_start|hexer_vial}Corruption Vials{colour_end}

TODO:On Friendly Skill: Other Heroes: Gain {colour_start|symptom}Symptom:{colour_end} {colour_start|quirk_rictus}Rictus Imperfectus{colour_end} {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(45%% Chance){colour_end}
TODO:{colour_start|skill_unselectable}A grin cracks the face in two, warping thoughts towards sadism and hunger.{colour_end}
TODO:On Attack: Other Heroes +3 {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} if not {colour_start|afflicted}Afflicted{colour_end}
TODO:On Attack: {colour_start|buff}Buff Others:{colour_end} +5%% ACC, +3%% CRIT, -33%% {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} Inflicted On Party if {colour_start|afflicted}Afflicted{colour_end}
TODO:Is banned from the Amber Refinery and Tek Exchange
TODO:50% Chance to Forcibly Interact with Corpse Curios
TODO:I'm STARVING, yes? I'm here to HELP you out. Let me accompany your SLAUGHTER in these foul lands.

TODO:With the power of his Evil Blood, the Hexer can melt down his enemies’ flesh, mind, and resistances. He has the power to cripple entire groups at once in various ways, both to enfeeble their assault and corrode their defenses. If necessary, he can also defend his allies against enemy hexes.

TODO:Fueled by his Evil Blood, the Hexer turns his own vital fluids into a lethal weapon. The greater his hatred and hunger, the more powerful it evolves. Though he has never gotten rid of his Straitjacket, it seems as if it’s protecting him not from himself, but from others instead. And none dare surmise that his leathery cloak breathes as if alive.

TODO:The Hexer is insane, malevolent, and solitary. Gorging himself on the fresh kills of past battles keeps him going for more. With his fiendish resilience and control over his blood, disease has no hold on him either, and he can hone it to amplify his curses. And should he come close to falling, the accursed serum he hates so much may prove beneficial.
Ces entraves ne peuvent contenir mon POUVOIR !
Après cela, VOUS serez les prochains.
Votre COLONNE sera arrachée et nettoyée, vertèbre par vertèbre.
Vous serez BROYÉS dans une mare de sang.
Hurlez d'AGONIE lorsque vous serez liquéfiés !
Vos cris sont un HYMNE pour les morts !
Vous serez NOYÉS dans votre propre sang !
Je vous ÉTRANGLERAI avec vos entrailles !
Tuez-les MAINTENANT, que je puisse me régaler...
Ils sont ASSAISONNÉS, et saignants. Il faut maintenant les achever !
J'ai hâte d'enfoncer mes DENTS dans leur gorge. Bientôt...
Mes fluides, ils s'ÉCHAPPENT de mon corps...
Imbécile ! Tu ne fais que me RENFORCER !
Tu OSES déverser ce chef d'œuvre ?
Mon sang COAGULE dans mes veines.
Sur d'autres, j'appellerais cela de l'ASSAISONNEMENT.
La douleur revient, et elle est INSOUTENABLE.
J'ai hâte de pouvoir ENFONCER mes dents dans quelque chose...
Cessez vos EXPÉRIMENTATIONS sur moi ! Mon sang n'a plus de secrets !
Tu t'occupes de ton ROI ? Excellent.
Je construirai un TRÔNE avec vos os !
Un roi ne PARDONNE pas si facilement...
Une telle faiblesse devant votre ROI.
Qu'importe le TEMPS, tant que je peux festoyer !
Plus de cibles pour ma MALVEILLANCE !
Gyihihi ! De retour, pour vous jouer un mauvais tour...
Je ne vois rien... Je ne vois RIEN...
Gyihi... Tu es désormais mon REPAS.
Si vous êtes tué, je ferai bon usage de votre CADAVRE.
Oh, un SURVIVANT, pas de chance.
Dommage, je vous DÉGUSTERAI une autre fois
Je me demande à quel point votre chair est SALÉE.
J'ai attendu si LONGTEMPS ce moment...
Enfin, ce que je désire. De la chair FRAÎCHE.
Vous savez que c'est MALPOLI de regarder les autres manger ? Gyihihi...
Foies et cerveaux, langues et cuisses... DÉLICIEUX.
Pff, en être RÉDUIT à utiliser ça.
Vous ne pouvez pas me FORCER... Je le fais volontairement.
Ça gratte et ça BRÛLE... Grrr...
Je RÉGNERAI sur tout, et les faibles seront mes repas.
Je suis bien plus FORT que n'importe quelle maladie...
Il est temps de TRAQUER... Hihihi.
Je ne ferai qu'un avec ces MONSTRES.
Il est l'heure de découvrir mon futur ROYAUME.
Vous feriez mieux de vous reprendre, de peur de DÉCEVOIR votre roi...
Préférez-vous m'affronter ou LES affronter ? Hihi.
Pensez à quel point ils ont BESOIN de vous. Que leur arriverait-il sinon ?
Aah, une carcasse bien mûre ! Parfait pour un goûter.
Le parfum de votre DÉSESPOIR est si rafraîchissant...
Excellent, il reste encore de la MOELLE sur ces os.
TODO:Unusual hungers and delight in misery...
TODO:{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Turn Start: Party: Receive 4 Stress (8%% Chance){colour_end}
TODO:{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Turn Start: Party: Receive 4 Stress (4%% Chance){colour_end}
TODO:{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Hexer Corruption Vial Consumption: Buff Self:{colour_end}
TODO:{colour_start|skill_unselectable}+2 SPD, +2%% CRT per Vial Consumed{colour_end}
TODO:A maniacal grin shows teeth stained crimson...
TODO:{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Turn Start: Party: Receive 4 Stress (15%% Chance){colour_end}
TODO:{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Turn Start: Party: Receive 4 Stress (8%% Chance){colour_end}
TODO:{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Hexer Corruption Vial Consumption: Buff Self:{colour_end}
TODO:{colour_start|skill_unselectable}+3 SPD, +4%% CRT per Vial Consumed{colour_end}
TODO:At last! Something to SATE this hunger...!
TODO:Such a delicious and ripe AROMA. Let me through!
TODO:I'm absolutely FAMISHED. Only this will do.
TODO:If you find my grin unsettling, just stop staring.
TODO:Oh, your suffering brings me such joy!
TODO:Watching you wretches die is simply RAPTUROUS!
TODO:The hunger the hunger the hunger the HUNGER...
TODO:My blood is a vessel to DIVINITY!
TODO:A whiff of HEAVEN with every wound I smell.
TODO:I demand the BEST cut of their innards!
TODO:Please! I can't take this anymore! The hunger is killing me!
TODO:My blood boils! It hurts so much, make it stop!
TODO:I don't know how much longer until I give in to these dark thoughts!
TODO:Are my thoughts even my own anymore?! Ahahaha!
TODO:{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end}'s symptoms have worsened, resulting in {colour_start|quirk_rictus}Rictus Mortis{colour_end}.
TODO:{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end}'s disease has grown more virulent, losing its stabilization.
TODO:I almost became lost to... That thing.
TODO:Promise me that if it gets worse again, you'll put me out of my misery.
TODO:(cracks a grin from ear to ear)
TODO:I have to admit, I'm PECKISH. Heehee!
TODO:My burning blood suddenly feels so EUPHORIC. Ahaha!
TODO:Aaah, finally I feel like MYSELF again!
TODO:Life had gotten dull without these GRUESOME visions.
TODO:I almost became lost to... That thing.
TODO:Promise me that if it gets worse again, you'll put me out of my misery.
Vous ne pouvez pas me DUPER.
Vous espérez que je fasse QUOI ?!
Vous êtes RIDICULE de penser que je gaspillerais mon temps ici.
Pensez à vous servir de votre CERVEAU.
J'ai tellement FAIM. Faites-moi sortir d'ici.
Laissez-moi sortir, que je puisse me GORGER de chair fraîche.
Votre roi a FAIM. J'exige des domestiques et un manoir.
J'ai BESOIN de me nourrir de sang et de chair.
Ooooh, j'ai tellement faim, TELLEMENT FAIM !
Ils ne pourront JAMAIS me remettre dans cet institut !
Ils ne peuvent pas me détruire ! Par mon sang, je suis IMMORTEL !
TODO:Such EXOTIC meals await me here!
TODO:To feel this arid breeze... It makes me THIRSTY, gyehehe.
TODO:Bah, these DESSICATED remains are barely a proper meal.
TODO:I better not get SAND where it itches. Ugh.
Je ne ferai RIEN pour me retenir. Gyihihi.
Vous avez l'AUDACE de m'envoyer ici. Hihihi !
Ils pourraient perdre un ou trois KILOS de chair...
Au VAINQUEUR, le butin sanglant. N'est-ce pas ?
TODO:What do you mean, BITING is foul play?
TODO:It's not my fault they didn't PROTECT their eyes.
TODO:Hmmm. You're a little too THIN for my taste.
TODO:You don't need their FINGER back, do you?
Enfin! Un peu de LUXE pour votre roi.
Excellent ! Je vous pardonne vos précédentes TRANSGRESSIONS.
Est-ce qu'il y a de quoi MANGER ?
J'ai entendu de bonnes choses sur cet AMBRE. J'ai hâte de découvrir, heehee.
TODO:It won't sate this HUNGER, but it's the second best thing!
TODO:Now THIS is worth my time! Gyahahaha!
TODO:Such EUPHORIA! I can feel my veins burning!
J'aimerais que ma viande soit aussi FRAÎCHE que possible.
DE L'ALCOOL ? C'est mauvais pour le sang.
Puis-je obtenir un steak SAIGNANT ? Splendide.
Si seulement j'avais encore ma FORTUNE.
Ce sont des dés en OS ? Comme ça. Pour savoir.
N'ESSAYEZ MÊME PAS DE ME LIGOTER !
PAS ENCORE ! JE REFUSE D'Y RETOURNER !
Je n'ai pas besoin de soins. Mon sang est PUR.
Je suis PARFAITEMENT capable de me soigner.
Cette infirmière RIDICULE est censée me soigner ?
TODO:This PALES in comparison to a fresh kill seasoned with suffering.
TODO:The next person to suggest me a beer will PERISH.
TODO:Actually, most vegetables and fruits are FANTASTIC for your blood pressure.
TODO:Do you dare BET a pound of flesh? Hahaha...
TODO:Why is it so DIFFICULT to find someone to play knife games?
TODO:I'll WAGER what's left of my soul, to get rid of it. Gyihihihi!
VOTRE MORT SERA LENTE ET CRUELLE, JE VOUS DÉVORERAI VIF !
TODO:Your syringes and leeches shall not DEFILE my blood.
TODO:I will GUT you with your own tools, hideous wretch.
TODO:You think you can CURE me? You are far too weak.
TODO:Don't you DARE send me there.
TODO:If you're trying to kill me, you'll find the results very UNPLEASANT.
TODO:Even if I PERISH, I shall reform and return.
TODO:I demand a QUALITY cut of meat, not this rubbish.
TODO:I wish to ENJOY their suffering, not bore myself.
TODO:There is that special delight in watching the strong COWER before you.
TODO:You challenge a KING? I need no champions, I will LIQUEFY you myself.
TODO:...Gyi? Is that a SERPENT I hear approaching?
TODO:Guard your king! I refuse to become a meal to these scaled PESTS.
TODO:Something large stirs UNDERNEATH me? I hope it's palatable.
ATTENTION à la cape, bande d'IDIOTS !
TODO:You're making your RULER walk like a fool. I will have your heads for this.
TODO:I can feel them staring - one THOUSAND eyes!
TODO:Is it all of you who are INSANE?! Or is it me?
TODO:Did it get a bit DARKER just now?
TODO:To blend IN with my surroundings...
TODO:Aaaah, my cloak FLUTTERS in delight.
TODO:I can SENSE it - yes, yes!
TODO:Soon we will feed, my BEAUTIFUL cloak.
TODO:I can taste so much FILTH in the air...
TODO:Let's find some things to EAT.
TODO:Leave me some SPACE in these corridors.
TODO:I didn't come here to WATCH grass grow.
Ce serait encore mieux avec de la VIANDE.
Je suis en train de M'ENDORMIR.
TODO:Let go of me! This ship is FULL of victims!
TODO:So much MEALS just passing by... Gyihihi!
TODO:The STENCH of all these peasants is mouth-watering.
TODO:This hunger can not be SATIATED!
TODO:I can't SEE, but I can SMELL deliciously rancid meals.
TODO:The hunger... I can't WITHHOLD it anymore!
TODO:I smell, I feel, I sense... a BANQUET of terror-seasoned flesh.
TODO:I've been STARVING for so long. No longer! Gyihihihi!
TODO:I'll get my POUND of flesh, my cut of organs, my pint of blood.
TODO:Get this damned SERUM out of me!
TODO:And I will CACKLE as I devour your flesh...
TODO:Oh, how TASTY your wounds look.
TODO:You can not RESTRAIN my hunger for long!
TODO:I can't wait to SATIATE this craving!
TODO:I will work my way UP from the liver to your lungs!
TODO:My saliva OOZES like a pus-filled wound...
TODO:Your voice is NOTHING compared to that of my hunger.
TODO:Your blood is IMPURE, yes. You have no say over me!
TODO:I will rip you apart if you try COMMANDING me once more.
TODO:My blood BOILS OVER. I can't hold it in, hyihihi...
TODO:Your BLOOD, it speaks to me... Yes!
TODO:Fester and rot, that I may SAVOUR your remains.
TODO:Your sorrow and fear is like a fine SPICE.
TODO:To see you STAINED in blood... Exquisite...
TODO:I will tear out your ORGANS and taste them!
TODO:I shall make your blood SPILL and add it to my own.
TODO:I will devour your EYEBALLS first!
TODO:I shall GNAW on your spine until nothing remains!
TODO:Go out and FEAST, blood of mine!
TODO:I must LET my blood to taste you better.
TODO:Do not part a KING from its MEAL.
TODO:Deny me my meal and face the PUNISHMENT I have in store for you...
TODO:The FUTURE holds pain for you!
TODO:The more you spill my blood, the more POWERFUL I become.
TODO:Yes, yes, yes! EMPTY their veins for me!
TODO:Go for the HEART and tear it out! Gihahaha!
TODO:Slash out their GUTS and strangle them with them!
TODO:Your whiff ruins the SEASONING of fear.
TODO:You lack a BITE. You are woefully placid.
TODO:You are BLIND by your sorrows.
TODO:To THINK that I would allow a tasty morsel to pass by.
TODO:I will GNASH on your flesh as you pass.
TODO:Instead, FEED me freshly chopped kidney.
TODO:This isn't RIPE enough for me.
TODO:I can't bear these restrains! My eyes ITCH!
TODO:I will RAKE out their eyes and lick the gaping holes... Yes...!
TODO:Are there any ROTTING remains here?
TODO:Let me through, I must SEEK for spoiled carcasses!
TODO:Allow me a TASTE of this. Gyihihi!
TODO:SUFFER and shriek in fear and agony!
TODO:I will tear your HAND clean off your wrist.
TODO:I must CONSUME all that remains. Gyehehe.
TODO:To gorge myself on your SPLEEN...
TODO:Only GORE can satisfy my hunger.
TODO:I crave for INNARDS, not this peasant's placebo.
TODO:I refuse to chew anything that is not GRISTLE.
TODO:How delightfully ripe for the taking!
TODO:Let me quiet that gurgling of my gut so you cease whining about it.
TODO:Spoils of some sort for your king, at last. Heehee!
TODO:Something to feast on during this famine!
TODO:Aaah, my heart beats in the THRILL.
TODO:The mind is STRONG, but the flesh is weak?
TODO:I will BATHE in the shower of gore!
TODO:This will be EASY. I can already taste them, gihihi...
TODO:My stomach ACHES. I can't bear this!
TODO:Your KING is... not so sure, actually! Geh!
TODO:What, you expect a MOTIVATIONAL quip?
TODO:Pfeh. Get in there and slay them before I slay YOU intead.
TODO:Yes, yes, a FINE job preparing my meal.
TODO:Why am I surrounded by an entourage of SIMPLETONS?
TODO:My next DECREE will be to whip you into shape.
TODO:You are too WEAK to protect your king!
TODO:Oooh, you've seasoned them with FEAR.
TODO:Playing with your food? I quite LIKE that.
TODO:You extend their SUFFERING? How evil. Gyahaha!
TODO:The strong will feast on the weak. And you're WEAK!
TODO:That's not how to PREPARE my future meal at all, you blockhead.
TODO:My OWN body is suddenly so appetizing?
TODO:Excellent, the HOWLING is back. Grrr.
TODO:Spare the SCIENCE. My blood is stronger!
TODO:You better be CAREFUL with administering that. Gyihi!
